name: OneSight Program
description: In order to obtain free eyewear through LensCrafters OneSight program, there must be a partnership with a charitable organization in the community. It can be any non-profit organization such as a school, church, Lions Club, Red Cross, United Way, YMCA, Catholic Charities or other social service agencies with 501(c)(3) status. This organization will need to pre-screen the individual to provide validation of financial need for assistance through our program.
fullDescription: In order to obtain free eyewear through LensCrafters OneSight program, there must be a partnership with a charitable organization in the community. It can be any non-profit organization such as a school, church, Lions Club, Red Cross, United Way, YMCA, Catholic Charities or other social service agencies with 501(c)(3) status. This organization will need to pre-screen the individual to provide validation of financial need for assistance through our program.
whatTheyOffer: In order to obtain free eyewear through LensCrafters OneSight program, there must be a partnership with a charitable organization in the community. It can be any non-profit organization such as a school, church, Lions Club, Red Cross, United Way, YMCA, Catholic Charities or other social service agencies with 501(c)(3) status. This organization will need to pre-screen the individual to provide validation of financial need for assistance through our program.
howToGetIt: Contact one of the local LensCrafters locations to find out which nonprofit partner is closest to you for voucher verification process.
